  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 - 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
